From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2020 Hindi mystery thriller film


HalahalPosterDirected byRandeep JhaWritten byZeishan QuadriScreenplay byGibran NooraniProduced byEros Motion PicturesZeishan QuadriPriyankka BassiShalini ChaudharyStarring
Sachin Khedekar
Barun Sobti
CinematographyPiyush PutyEdited byNitesh BhatiaMusic bySageesh Bhandari 
Naman AdhikariAbhinav SharmaArjun BhaybhangProductioncompanyEros InternationalDistributed byEros NowRelease date
21 September 2020 (2020-09-21)
Running time97 minutesCountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Halahal is an Indian Hindi-language mystery thriller film which premiered on Eros Now on 21 September 2020.[1] Based on M.P Vyapam scam.[2] The film was written and produced by Zeishan Quadri and directed by Randeep Jha. Starring Sachin Khedekar and Barun Sobti.[3] This film is loosely based on Vyapam Scam.[4]


Plot[edit]
This film revolves with the journey of Doctor Shiv Shankar to find out the truth of his daughter's murder. Yusuf, a corrupt police inspector helps him to search the man behind the incident. It reveals that Shiv's daughter was killed but the case was fabricated as suicide. Big Medical education mafias are involved with the issue and unfortunately Shiv's daughter Archana was also a part of the racket.[5]

Cast[edit]
Sachin Khedekar as Dr. Shiv Shankar Sharma
Barun Sobti as Inspector Yusuf Qureshi
Manu Rishi Chadha as Bhaisahab
Purnendu Bhattacharya as Acharya
Archit Sharma as Sanaya
Sanaya Bansal as Pooja
Anuradha Mukherjee as Nandini
Vijay Kumar Dogra as Manoj
Chetan Sharma as Ashish
Tilak Raj Joshi as Subhash
Hurmat Ali Khan as Prakash Rao
Dimple Kaur as Sunita
Jitender Gaur as Hooda
Reception[edit]
Archika Khurana of The Times of India gave the film two and a half out of five stars stating "The story is griping in the beginning but tends to get a bit draggy towards the end. However, the final nail in the coffin is its unrealistic climax."[6]
Writing in News18 Rohit Vats states "Minor flaws overlooked, Halahal is engaging for sure, and its lead talents are quite impressive. With careful project selection, the director can offer much more."[7]
The Free Press Journal gave the movie three stars out of five and Heer Kothari states "Impressive performances make this film watchable."[8]

References[edit]

^ "'The Whistleblower' review: Ravi Kishan and Ritwik Bhowmik hold steady in uneven web series". scroll.in. 17 December 2021. Archived from the original on 4 October 2022. Retrieved 26 May 2022.]

^ "Halahal trailer: Sachin Khedekar sets out to find truth behind his daughter's death, with Barun Sobti". India Today. 18 September 2020. Archived from the original on 21 September 2020. Retrieved 21 September 2020.

^ IANS (7 March 2019). "'Halahal': Movie Based on the 2013 Vyapam Scam in the Pipeline". TheQuint. Archived from the original on 27 December 2022. Retrieved 27 December 2022.

^ "Halahal (2020) Movie: Watch Full Movie Online on JioCinema". Jiocinema. Archived from the original on 2 February 2023. Retrieved 27 December 2022.

^ "Halahal Review: Good performances make this tedious mystery-thriller watchable", The Times of India, archived from the original on 12 November 2020, retrieved 12 November 2020

^ "Halahal Movie Review: Barun Sobti's Calm Demeanour Adds Dimensions to Murder Mystery". News18. 23 September 2020. Archived from the original on 12 November 2020. Retrieved 12 November 2020.
